content: this crochet ms rachel doll is the perfect size for little hands with her iconic overalls and pink hairband she is just adorable just 4 5 inches tall with dk yarn and a 2 75mm crochet hook if you prefer a bigger doll you can use super bulky blanket yarn and a 7mm crochet hook for a 12 inch doll part of our kozu palm pals series 1 her hair cap is interchangeable with any of the other dolls in the series so you can crochet her as ms rachel or just a cute doll with overalls this listing is for the ads-free print-friendly pdf pattern the proceeds for the pattern will all go to the palestine children s relief fund pcrf however you can find the free pattern on our blog at https //chaicoffeecrochet com/ms-rachel-crochet-doll/ happy crocheting 1 https //chaicoffeecrochet com/kozu-palm-pals-crochet-dolls
